statements: SELECT * FROM SequenceAnalysisResults ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, result_summary FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE analysis_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE result_summary LIKE '%mutation%';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, research_findings FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE research_findings->'mutation_status' = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE analysis_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date FROM SequenceAnalysisResults ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, research_findings FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_analysis FROM SequenceAnalysisResults;
SELECT analysis_id, result_summary FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE research_findings->>'important' = 'yes';
SELECT * FROM sequence_analysis_results;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_date FROM sequence_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM sequence_analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Genomics';
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT finding_id, research_topic FROM research_findings ORDER BY finding_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sequence_analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'GENE SEQUENCE' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC, analysis_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_date FROM sequence_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT finding_id, research_topic, researcher_name FROM research_findings WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY research_topic ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE finding_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY finding_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT analysis_id, result FROM sequence_analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'STRUCTURAL ANALYSIS' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM sequence_analysis_results;
SELECT id, analysis_date, result FROM sequence_analysis_results WHERE id > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT analysis_type FROM sequence_analysis_results;
SELECT * FROM research_findings ORDER BY finding_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, findings_summary FROM research_findings WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM sequence_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, analysis_type FROM sequence_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, findings_summary FROM research_findings WHERE ID = 3;
SELECT * FROM findings_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sequence_analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Genomics' OR analysis_type = 'Proteomics';
SELECT * FROM SequenceAnalysisResults;
SELECT sequence_name, analysis_result FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ResearchFindings ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT research_topic, findings FROM ResearchFindings WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY research_topic ASC;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM ResearchAuthors WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT * FROM SequenceAnalysisResults ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sequence_name, analysis_result FROM SequenceAnalysisResults WHERE sequence_name LIKE 'Gene%' AND analysis_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM ResearchAuthors WHERE affiliation = 'University A' ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT reference_title, publication_date, authors FROM ResearchReferences WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT research_topic, findings FROM ResearchFindings WHERE research_topic IN ('Topic A', 'Topic B', 'Topic C') AND findings LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sequence_results;
SELECT id, sequence_id, analysis_result FROM sequence_results WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT analysis_result, analysis_date FROM sequence_results WHERE analysis_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_findings ORDER BY finding_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_lead, start_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_lead = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM sequence_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT research_id, finding FROM research_findings WHERE researcher_id = 12345;
SELECT project_name, project_lead, start_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(id), AVG(sequence_id) FROM sequencing_logs GROUP BY sequence_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5;
SELECT researcher_id, team_lead, team_member FROM research_team WHERE team_lead = TRUE OR team_member = TRUE;
